page.title: 20COMPLETING THE SURVEY
page.content: This survey was completed by the pupils and staff of St.Wenn C.P.School during June and July 1985.It was soon realised that there was a great deal to say about our environment but little about amentities.The count was completed in about thirty minutes! Those who worked on the assignment were as follows: TRANSPORT:Nick Soper,Seb Brenton and Simon Davies STREAMS: Matthew Liddicoat and Rex Crowle HEDGES: Donna Liddicoat,Tracey Wills and Lynn Nicholls FARMS: Matthew Hawken and Jesse Rowe RELIGION: Julie Nicholls,Clare Piper EDUCATION & HOUSING:Amelia Turner,Lisa Shear MOORS & WOODLAND: Simon Akehurst,James Hill Also Mr T.Hodder and Mrs E.Hawken
